mapper.select: select b.BILL_CODE as bill_code, b.USER_ID as user_id, b.bill_issu_de as bill_issu_de, b.BILL_TOTAMT as bill_totamt from bill b, delivery d where b.BILL_CODE = d.bill_code and b.BHF_CODE = #{bhf_code} and d.delivery_state = 'ready';

select b.bill_code as bill_code, b.USER_ID as user_id, g.GOODS_NM as goods_nm, g.goods_pc as goods_pc, pg.PURCHSGOODS_QY as purchsgoods_qy, b.BILL_TOTAMT as bill_totamt, d.delivery_addr as delivery_addr from purchase_goods pg, goods g, bill b, delivery d where d.bill_code = #{bill_code} and pg.GOODS_CODE = g.GOODS_CODE and b.BILL_CODE = d.bill_code and d.bill_code = pg.BILL_CODE;
